name: com.endava.uxmlbindinggenerator
description: Creates Binding code files from VisualTreeAssets (*.uxmls), depending on settings within project settings.

samples.description: Demonstrates a simple uxml, which you can create a binding with. No collisions - just pure 1:1 binding file creation.
Shows a uxml having collided/duplicated or unnamed entries, which are ignored by the binding generator.
Add this folder to your uxml binding settings "ignore list" to exclude it from the generation.
Demonstrates a binding of a uxml template instance, which is interpretated as VisualElement.
Demonstrates a How-To for include the binded
